text: This is awesome! I've been working on a projectional lisp editor lately, and I've been thinking how the approach to visualising AST and then transforming it from the UI components could be generalised to handle any type of data/UI - like visual bi-directional lenses - it's great to see something like this alive - can't wait to dig in!

text: To update on this, I have been using CLion today (it is totally awesome, FWIW).  And the feature I mentioned is actually implemented in CLion - they call it 'Search Everywhere', and it is accessible with <SHIFT><SHIFT>. It works exactly like the VC one as far as I can tell.
